rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A minimalist entry space with a small reception area and cloakroom for visitors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room designed to maximize natural light with large windows and minimalistic decor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact, functional kitchen with open view into the living area to promote family interaction. Vastu-aligned placement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor featuring a walk-in closet and large windows for daylighting.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom adjacent to the living area for easy access and comfort.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern ensuite bathroom attached to the master bedroom with a focus on clean lines and functional space.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Compact utility room for washing machines, storage, and other appliances; placed to optimize energy use.

openings.description: A wide entrance door leading to the entry hallway, designed for easy access and welcoming atmosphere.
Large windows on the east facade to maximize morning sunlight as per Vastu principles.
South-facing windows for optimal natural light and ventilation throughout the day.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space on the first floor for children or extended family, with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A quiet study area integrated into the townhouse design for work or relaxation, with a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Library/Reading Room
rooms.description: A compact library and reading room space designed to maximize natural light with built-in shelves for minimalistic storage.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A small balcony overlooking the swimming pool and garden areas to enhance natural ventilation.

openings.description: A minimalist staircase connecting ground and first floor with open treads for light.
Door leading to the balcony for access and additional outdoor space.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: A spacious swimming pool area integrated into the design with a deck and seating for relaxation.

openings.description: Entrance to the swimming pool area from the townhouse.
